name: Bots Chaos - Coming soon...
description:
Bots Chaos - Coming soon... Can you finish this game in 10 minutes?

Bots Chaos is an FPS game where you must destroy many robots to beat a score in a given time (10 minutes).

You have to destroy the robots using the different weapons that you have, and you also have to avoid the attacks of the robots and the harmful elements of the environment using bullet time.

Unlimited Bullet Time

You can slow down time whenever you want, but the countdown to 10 minutes will speed up.

Weapons
  • Pistol
  • Shotgun, with secondary attack: multiple targets
  • Machine gun, with secondary attack: fixed target
Movement Skills
  • Dash
  • Double jump
Gameplay
